tool_description:
The P2000 API provides a live feed used by the Dutch Emergency Services.

De P2000 API biedt een live feed van het P2000 netwerk, wat gebruikt wordt door ambulance, brandweer, politie en knrm
name: P2000
title: P2000

api_list.name: latest
api_list.description:
last P2000 message

- `?limit=10` (number between 10 and 500)
- `?flex=true` (raw FLEX line with date)

optional_parameters.name: flex
optional_parameters.description: Enable if you only want the raw FLEX line

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the amount of p2000 messages you want to show
